channel.title: R-ABE Keyserver API
channel.description: Recent content on R-ABE Keyserver API

item.title: R-ABE Keyserver
item.description: Welcome to the R-ABE Keyserver API! This REST API wraps the attribute based encryption (ABE) schemes of the R-ABE library and can be used to set up an ABE key server. Currently, the keyserver API supports only the “BSW” scheme, as described in [1], but we plan to add support for all six schemes implemented by R-ABE. Note that the API is still under development and must not be used in production.
